abilities.name: Watchful Swarm
abilities.desc: Tiny drones orbit the Warframe or an ally and intercept enemy fire.

abilities.name: Benevolent Decoy
abilities.desc: Creates beacons that draw enemy fire, converting the damage into healing pulses.

abilities.name: Warding Grace
abilities.desc: Renders the Warframe and nearby allies immune to Status Effects, while slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Vengeful Rush
abilities.desc: All damage taken is transformed into Energy; abilities gain enhanced range, duration and power.

abilities.name: Bloomer
abilities.desc: Fires a high-yield, remotely detonated explosive projectile capable of latching onto targets.

abilities.name: Core Vent
abilities.desc: Vents out the Archwing's propulsion core, confusing enemy projectiles and causing them to detonate.

abilities.name: Thumper
abilities.desc: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.

abilities.name: Warhead
abilities.desc: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.

abilities.name: Arch Line
abilities.desc: Launch a tethered hook that either pulls enemies close, or pulls the Warframe toward stationary objects.

abilities.name: Penumba
abilities.desc: Activates a cloaking field that hides the Warframe and any nearby allies who remain stationary.

abilities.name: Cosmic Crush
abilities.desc: Forms a miniature black hole that sucks in nearby objects before rupturing in a massive shock wave.

abilities.name: Fighter Escort
abilities.desc: Deploys drones that fight alongside the Warframe, detonating in a destructive blast when killed.

abilities.name: Energy Shell
abilities.desc: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe.

abilities.name: Disarray
abilities.desc: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.

abilities.name: Seeking Fire
abilities.desc: Fires a large volley of homing missiles.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.desc: Massive pulse of energy that stuns nearby enemies and sends them flying.

abilities.name: Energy Shell
abilities.desc: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe.

abilities.name: Disarray
abilities.desc: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.

abilities.name: Seeking Fire
abilities.desc: Fires a large volley of homing missiles.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.desc: Massive pulse of energy that stuns nearby enemies and sends them flying.

abilities.name: Meathook
abilities.desc: Skewer and hold a target. Use again to hurl the victim, damaging them and anyone near the impact site.

abilities.name: Shield Maiden
abilities.desc: Raise Bonewidow’s shield to block incoming forward damage. While active, bash enemies with a Maiden’s Kiss.

stats.Misc: 3 s invulnerability • 160 / 220° blocking angles • 10 s cooldown upon breaking

abilities.name: Firing Line
abilities.desc: Sweep surrounding enemies into the line of fire with a force beam.

abilities.name: Exalted Ironbride
abilities.desc: Summon a devastating exalted blade.

abilities.name: Necraweb
abilities.desc: Hurl a canister of gravitation fluids to create a wide net that slows enemies; shoot it in mid-air to create a fiery conflagration.

abilities.name: Storm Shroud
abilities.desc: Swathe the Necramech in an electrical field that greatly enhances survivability in close combat.

abilities.name: Gravemines
abilities.desc: Launch a pattern of charged mines that detonate in a violent blast when touched.

stats.Misc: 3 m explosion radius • 2.5 s self detonation time

abilities.name: Guard Mode
abilities.desc: Take a stationary stance to deploy maximum firepower and gain increased structural integrity.
